value.scalar: Product: Nationwide Term Life - Guaranteed level term is generally a good fit for young families looking for affordable protection  - Can be converted to any flexible premium, permanent life insurance policy  - Conversion is allowed for the term duration or to age 65 years, whichever is less  - Chronic Illness, Critical Illness and Terminal Illness benefits included on most policies   Product: Nationwide Whole Life - Provides coverage for an individuals entire life, rather than for a specified term; a savings component, called cash value, builds over time  - Offers premium rates, cash values and death benefits that are all guaranteed  - Gives clients plenty of choices for protection, including lower minimum coverage amounts of $10,000 and a selection of payment lengths: level premiums to age 100 or for 20 years  - Chronic Illness, Critical Illness and Terminal Illness benefits included on most policies

intents.description: Please transfer me to an agent

variables.title: answer
variables.description: The text generated by the model in response to the user prompt.

variables.title: discovery_date_version
variables.description: Discovery date versions are documented in the release notes (https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/discovery-data?topic=discovery-data-release-notes).

variables.title: discovery_project_id
variables.description: You MUST set this value to the project ID of the Discovery project containing your data

initial_value.scalar: Read the list of Products and their Description below and answer the question only from the content provided below. In the answer provide Product name and the explanation using the specific Description line. ***  Product: Conventional Fixed Rate Loan Description: - The lowest fixed rates for eligible buyers - No interest-rate surprises - Plan to stay in your home for a long time - Have an established credit history - Can put at least 5% down on a home - Available for 10-year, 15-year, 20-year and 30-year terms   Product: Adjustable-Rate Mortgage (ARM) Loan Description: - The lowest short-term rates - Initial lower monthly payments - Initial rate periods of 3-10 years, then rates can adjust up or down - Know you'll be moving within the next few years - Have an established credit history - Can put at least 5% down on a home - 5-year ARM loans - generally provide the lowest interest rates and monthly payments during the initial rate period. These loans are ideal for borrowers who plan to move or refinance within the five-year period. - 7-year ARM loans - provide seven years of predictable monthly principal and interest payments at a low interest rate before any adjustments are made. If you expect to move or refinance within the seven-year period, this may be a good option. - 10-year ARM loans- are increasingly popular as they combine significant savings for the initial rate period with longer protection from market-based interest rate fluctuations.   Product: Federal Housing Administration (FHA) Loan Description: - Low down payments - Flexible qualification guidelines - Fixed-rate - Have limited funds for a down payment - Don't have an established credit history or have experienced credit challenges in the past  Product: Veterans Affair (VA) Loan Description: - Low or no down payments - No mortgage insurance requirement - Flexible qualification guidelines - Fixed-rate and ARM options - Are an active military member or veteran - Are the surviving spouse of a service member who died as a result of military service   Product: Jumbo Loans Description: - Increased purchase limits for higher-priced properties - Competitive rates - Fixed-rate and ARM options - Are buying a home that exceeds conforming loan limits ($766,550 in most areas) - Have an established credit history - Low down payment options  Product: Investment Property Loans Description: - Financing for residential rental property with 1-4 units - A variety of loan options to choose from - Want to become a landlord - Are buying a second home  Product: New Construction and Lot Loans Description: - Convenient financing for new construction - Construction-to-permanent loan options - Are building a new home to your specifications - Are buying a lot for a future home    ***

variables.title: model_parameters_max_new_tokens
variables.description: The maximum number of new tokens to be generated.

variables.title: model_response
variables.description: The text generated by the model in response to the inputs.

variables.title: prompt
variables.description: You MAY change this to do prompt engineering, but a default will be used by watsonx if you dont pass a prompt here.

variables.title: query_text
variables.description: You MAY change this to pass queries to Watson Discovery. By default the Search action passes the users input.text directly.
